## About
Ananya Bhaktaram is a doctoral student in the Department of Health Behavior and
Society at the Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of public Health. She studies geographic
and spatial factors that influence community formation and disolution. 

## Interests
- Social and Structural Determinants of Health
- Geographic Information Systems
- Social Networks
- Community Formation

## Education 
**Johns Hopkins University** | Baltimore, MD

  - PhD in Social and Behavioral Sciences | 2023 - Present 

  - MHS in Social Factors in Health | 2021 - 2023

**The University of Oklahoma** | Norman, OK 

  - B.A. in Community Health (Minor in GIS) | 2017 - 2021
  
  - B.A. in Letters (Minor in Constitutional Studies) | 2017 - 2021
